name: Owl of Control
description:
Game works best in full screen.

You may have to spam click if you want to finish the game, it is only 30 seconds. 

You can move the owl with your mouse.

Everything in this game was made by only me and was made during the jam. All art, sound, script, and the story were created during the jam.

Some words have been cut off so here is a short entry:

Creatures are trying to break the tree trunk barrier.

Defend it with the magic you have taken.

Magic is very unpredictable though.

If you click you can summon a fire ball but the rest of the powers are

out of your control.
